bibl.title: Claudius Ptolemy on Egypt and East Africa.
The Ptolemies, the Sea and the Nile. Studies in Waterborne Power.

bibl.note: Evaluates why and to what extent Ptolemy used sources from Ptolemaic times in his description of Egypt and its adjacent countries, in particular of the upper part of the Nile.
